class.rdfs:comment: A single message from a sender to one or more organizations or people.
class.rdfs:label: Message

schema:bccRecipient.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient blind copied on a message.
schema:bccRecipient.rdfs:label: bccRecipient

schema:ccRecipient.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.
schema:ccRecipient.rdfs:label: ccRecipient

schema:dateRead.rdfs:comment: The date/time at which the message has been read by the recipient if a single recipient exists.
schema:dateRead.rdfs:label: dateRead

schema:dateReceived.rdfs:comment: The date/time the message was received if a single recipient exists.
schema:dateReceived.rdfs:label: dateReceived

schema:dateSent.rdfs:comment: The date/time at which the message was sent.
schema:dateSent.rdfs:label: dateSent

schema:messageAttachment.rdfs:comment: A CreativeWork attached to the message.
schema:messageAttachment.rdfs:label: messageAttachment

schema:recipient.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.
schema:recipient.rdfs:label: recipient

schema:sender.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the sending end of the action.
schema:sender.rdfs:label: sender

schema:toRecipient.rdfs:comment: A sub property of recipient. The recipient who was directly sent the message.
schema:toRecipient.rdfs:label: toRecipient
